name: Brutal Universe
description:
Your out of fuel in the middle of an asteroid belt and the only way to escape is by using your GMD (Gravity Manipulation Device) and you only have 60 seconds until the battery drains. As you approch "lightspeed" (as is indicated on the bar to the left) the speed of time decreases exponentialy until it stops completly when you reach lightspeed. Gain as much altitude as you can before the time runs out...

CONTROLS  - PC and Mac

  • Hold space to activate the GMD
  • R to restart
  • ESC to main Menu

CONTROLS - Android

  • Tap anywhere on the screen to activate the GMD
  • Swipe up for main menu
  • Swipe down to restart

How is the "SPIN" theme implemented?
You will understand after 5 seconds of gameplay, i can asure you.
